What factors does Google Ads take into account when determining whether a remarketing list qualifies for inclusion in a similar audiences list?
options: the number of visitors on the list
the amount of revenue generated by the list
the average bid targeting the list
the average monthly spend targeting the list
answer: the number of visitors on the list

If someone performs a search for "most comfortable chair", which ad description text would likely perform the best?
options: Don't be uncomfortable. Get a new chair. Try the LumbarPro today.
Experience the most comfortable chair, with more than 1,000 five-star reviews.
Try the LumbarPro, a chair that has been reviewed as comfortable by more than 1,000 people.
Need a new chair? The LumbarPro is the highest rated chair. Try this chair, today.
answer: Experience the most comfortable chair, with more than 1,000 five-star reviews.

question: Why would you use callout extensions?
options: to share pricing on various business offerings
to highlight key features and unique offers
to show reviews of your product or service
to add phone numbers to the ad
answer: to highlight key features and unique offers

question: You have a maximum CPC bid of $4 for the keyword **Coffee Mugs**. What tool could you use to determine the projected result of raising the bid to $4.50?

When reviewing a campaign, you notice that your cost per conversion on desktop is much lower than on mobile. How should you optimize the bidding strategy is you wanted to increase the overall number of campaign conversions?
options: Increase the desktop bid adjustment for this campaign
Increase the ad frequency for the campaign
Decrease the desktop bid adjustment for the campaign
Increase both the desktop and mobile ad adjustments
answer: Increase the desktop bid adjustment for this campaign

question: With Google's Active View technology, when is an impression of a display ad considered viewable?
options: when the user leaves the page the ad appears on
when any part of the ad is on-screen for 5 seconds
when the entire ad first appears on the screen
when at least 50% of the ad is on-screen for at least 1 second
answer: when at least 50% of the ad is on-screen for at least 1 second

question: Rhama wants to increase her bids for any customers that are within a selected radius of her storefront. What would you recommend she do?
options: Create an ad group with higher bids, targeted to that geographical region
Restrict the campaign to only the radius
answer: Create an ad group with higher bids, targeted to that geographical region

question: Sion is having a sale that will last three days. He wants his ad text to show how much time is remaining in the sale. Would would you recoment for Sion?
options: Use the sale extension and set the sale duration for each time zone.
Do not include the sale in the ad text, as this likley violated Google Ads editorial policies.
Add a countdown customizer to the ad text.
Manually adjust the ad text as frequently as possible to reflect the time remaining
answer: Add a countdown customizer to the ad text.

question: Tabitha has a mobile application that is complementary to her website. She wants to make it known to potential customers, but driving app downloads is not her main goal. What would you recommend she configure on her Google Ads?

Why are aad extensions beneficial?
options: They increase the character count for descriptions and headlines
They expand the ad and tend to increase the clickthrough rate
They allow you to integrate your data with third-party platforms such as Google Analytics
They reduce the overall cost of your campaigns
answer: They expand the ad and tend to increase the clickthrough rate

options: one campaign with an ad group for each location
one ad group containing all locations
one ad group for each service
answer: one campaign with an ad group for each location

question: What is ad frequency?
options: the total number of impressions your advertisement receives
the total number of users who clicked on your advertisement
the number of times a single user will see your advertisement
the number of visitors who completed the checkout process
answer: the number of times a single user will see your advertisement

Farhann is running advertisements that are targetting only Italy, but he sees that his ads are receiving clicks from people in Greece. What is the most likely reason?
options: Italian people visiting Greece are searching for "best restaurant in Greece"
People in Greece are conducting searches such as "best restaurant in Italy"
Greek people visiting Italy are searching for "best restaurants in Italy"
People in Italy are conducting searches such as "best restaurants in Greece"
answer: People in Greece are conducting searches such as "best restaurant in Italy"

Use the maximum bid amount as suggested by Keyword Planner
Create an ad group, with top of page as the only location target
answer: Inform Linzi this is not possible

Why is it important to know your cost per conversion?
options: You can compare your cost per conversion to your competitors
Your cost per conversion helps you understand your ROI
A lower cost per conversion will improve your ad rank
answer: Your cost per conversion helps you understand your ROI

question: Mark has configured ad extensions for every campaign, but his ads never show them. What is the most likely explanation?
options: The Ad Rank is too low
The bidding strategy is not set to ECPC
answer: The Ad Rank is too low

question: What tool should you use to determine where your ad will appear for a particular search query?

Add an exact match keyword as **\[computer\]**.

question: #### Q.52. You want to determine exactly what search terms triggered your ads to display. What do you do?
#### Q.53. Which statement is true when structuring ad groups?
options: Adding more ads to an ad group will improve the likelihood of multiple ads appearing for a search query.
Adding more ads to an ad group provides more chances for success in an auction.
Adding fewer ads to an ad group will improve the likelihood of an ad receiving a high-quality score.
Adding fewer ads to an ad group means higher bounce rates.
answer: Adding more ads to an ad group provides more chances for success in an auction.
